name: KenpoBuddy
0:
”Alexa, ask Kenpo Buddy what is the attack for delayed sword?”
”Alexa, ask Kenpo Buddy to tell me about sword of destruction”
”Alexa, ask Kenpo Buddy to teach me deflecting hammer”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kenpo buddy
des: Kenpo Buddy is your own personal encyclopedia of Ed Parker's American Kenpo techniques and forms. Ask Kenpo Buddy about any technique to learn about the attack it defends against, which belt it is required for, and even a step-by-step guide to executing the technique. Like most things Kenpo, this information presented by this skill is not authoritative; you may have learned certain techniques slightly differently, but the principles remain the same. If Kenpo buddy doesn't know a skill, check back later, since more are being added every day!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
